Title: WPFGridControl
Description: This is a very small project addressing the common problem that everyone faces regarding GridLines in WPF Grid Panel. Now you can have your own color, thickness for Grid Lines.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a very small project addressing the common problem that everyone faces regarding GridLines in WPF Grid Panel. Now you can have your own color, thickness for Grid Lines.

General Description and usage can be found at : How to change WPF GridLines
